item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Ildi Czeller and I work as a Data Scientist at Emarsys in the Budapest office since I graduated as a mathematician from ELTE. Besides my work at Emarsys I am a mentor and organizer at Techcamp. I am also a proud alumna and supporter of The Joy of Thinking Foundation.
